text: aap keh dijiye ke aye ahle kitaab! aisi insaaf waali baath ki taraf aao, jo hum mein tum mein baraabar hai, ke hum Allah ta’ala ke siva kisi ki ibaadath na kare, na us ke saath kisi ko shareek banaaye, na Allah ta’ala ko chohd kar aapas mein ek dosre ko hee rab banaaye, pas agar wo mu pher le, to tum kehdo ke gawaah raho, hum to musalmaan hai
